name: Santipur Bharat Siksha Institute
briefDescription: BHARAT SIKSHA INSTITUTE is a not-for-profit organization based in MECHEDA, KOLAGHAT Sub-Division, West Bengal. Established on 13th March 2005 and registered on 8th August 2005 under West Bengal Societies Regd. Act. (1961), the Society works in various sectors  in Purba Medinipur District and many other socially and economically underdeveloped areas in West Bengal. The objective of the Society is to help the needy people to achieve and sustain a better quality of life and to strengthen their involvement, their rights and responsibility in the fast growing development of the country  Vision   To evolve a pragmatic strategy in ensuring better lives for humanity at large.  To inculcate self building potentials among the poor and marginal.
